description: Enterprise techniques used by Wiarp, ATT&CK software S0206 (v1.1)
name: Wiarp (S0206)

techniques.comment: [Wiarp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0206) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can open a command line interface.(Citation: Symantec Wiarp May 2012)
[Wiarp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0206) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can create a service.(Citation: Symantec Wiarp May 2012)
[Wiarp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0206) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can download files.(Citation: Symantec Wiarp May 2012)
[Wiarp](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0206) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can inject files into running processes.(Citation: Symantec Wiarp May 2012)
